original: Kullander, Karl Petrus, fd. lotsdi-rektör, Göteborg, f. 27/3/80 i Upps. av lektor Emil K. o. Vendia Blomberg. G. 06’ m. Henny Bagge, d. 41. Barn: Sif f. 04, g. 34-38 m. leg. läk. Fred Chenhall, Engl.; Leif f. 05, d. 15; Rolf f. 07, und:löjtn. v. flottan, d. 34. — Sjökapt:ex. 01, res:off:ex. v. flottan 02, genomg. KSHS 02-04. Und:löjtn. 02, 1’öjtn. 04, kapt. 16. Lots-löjtn. eller tidvis tf. lotskapt. inom övre o. nedre nDrra, melL, isödra o. västra distr. 05-27, lotsdir. o. chef f. västra distr. 28-46. Ordf. i styr. f. Lotsverkets ensk. pens :kassa sed. 19, Umeå hamndir., handels- o. sjöf :nd 22-27, sakk. bisitt. i Gbgs rådhusr. sed. 29, 1 :e ’kommiss. f. granskn. av ut-märkn. av sjögränsen mot Norge 37, ordf. i Naut. fören. i Gbg sed. 41, medl. av Tekn. samf., Coldinuorden o. Traveililers’ club. RNO, RVO.
translated: Kullander, Karl Petrus, former pilot director, Gothenburg, born on 27/3/80 in Uppsala, son of lecturer Emil K. and Vendia Blomberg. Married in 1906 to Henny Bagge, deceased in 1941. Children: Sif, born in 1904, married from 1934 to 1938 to Dr. Fred Chenhall, English; Leif, born in 1905, deceased in 1915; Rolf, born in 1907, lieutenant in the navy, deceased in 1934. Ship captain's exam in 1901, naval officer's exam in 1902, attended Kungliga Sjökrigsskolan (Royal Naval Academy) from 1902-1904. Lieutenant in 1902, first lieutenant in 1904, captain in 1916. Pilot lieutenant or occasionally acting pilot captain in the upper and lower northern, middle, southern, and western districts from 1905-1927. Pilot director and chief for the western district from 1928-1946. Chairman of the board for the Private Pension Fund of the Pilot Authority since 1919, Umeå port director, trade and shipping consultant from 1922-1927, expert assistant in the Gothenburg City Council since 1929, first commissioner for the investigation of marking the sea border with Norway in 1937, chairman of the Nautical Association in Gothenburg since 1941, member of the Technical Society, Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav, Royal Swedish Order of Vasa.

honors.description: Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav
